item.title: 23.7.30_R
item.author: griedzx
item.description: 运用代码 1 2 3 4 5 6 keywords <- c("calcium", "calmodulin") matched_indices <- sapply(keywords, function(keyword){ str_detect(GO@result$Description, fixed(keyword, ignore_case = T)) }) matched_indices <- apply(matched_indices, 1, any) matched_terms <- GO@result[matched_indices,]
